'Harrassowitz Verlag' is a German academic publishing house, based in Wiesbaden.
It publishes about 150 scholarly books and periodicals per year on Oriental,
Slavic and Book and Library Studies. The publishing house is part of the company
Otto Harrassowitz GmbH & Co. KG, founded by Otto Harrassowitz, which is a book
vendor for academic and research libraries, founded in Leipzig in 1872.
